name: PHVS_VaccineAdministered_HepatitisB
title: Vaccine Administered (Hepatitis B)
description: Hepatitis B vaccine value set has Hepatitis B vaccines. This is based upon the Clinical Vaccines Administered (CVX) vocabulary maintained by CDC.
